reviewtext: I love this bag, it is the perfect for the Nikon D40 with either the 18-55 or the 55-200mm lens.  You can't fit both lens in it of course, that's not what it's for.  I also have the Nikon strap attached do my D40 and it easily fits inside this topload zoom mini bag.  I don't know what other people mean by this bag is too small, it's the perfect size.
summary: perfect for the D40 with either 18-55 or 55-200mm lenses
